Jurgen Klopp: “We could all look for something else if we want. But I think the only reason to leave Liverpool at the moment is the weather. What other reason could be there? This is one of the biggest clubs in the world.” #awlfc [mail]

Klopp: “Trent got the captaincy because he was longest in the club. Mo is a very important player for me obviously, but this story around him isn’t.”
